episode.summary: Discussing content moderation and Section 230 of the CDA
episode.detail: Professor Zittrain is the George Bemis Professor of International Law at Harvard Law School. He is also a professor at the Harvard Kennedy School of Government, a professor of computer science at the Harvard School of Engineering and Applied Sciences, director of the Harvard Law School Library, and co-founder and director of Harvardâ€™s Berkman Klein Center for Internet & Society.
